content: Zoltan Mann | Complex Cyber-Infrastructures (CCI)SearchZoltan MannAssociate ProfessorUniversity of AmsterdamZoltan Mann is a researcher with wide-ranging interests in computer science, from theory (optimization problems, algorithms, complexity) to practice (security and privacy, data protection, cloud computing, edge computing). Before joining the University of Amsterdam in 2021, he worked as associate professor at Budapest University of Technology and Economics (Hungary) and as senior researcher at the University of Duisburg-Essen (Germany). In addition, he held various industry positions in software engineering, IT consulting, and management consulting.
